publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1751 Mr David Davidson: 16th Spencer Dayman Meningitis UK Walk—That the Parliament congratulates the organisers of, and participants in, the 16th Spencer Dayman Meningitis UK walk which covers 770 miles from Peterhead to Lyme Regis in 36 days and notes that the charity has not only raised over £1 million to fund research into producing a vaccine to protect against all forms of bacterial meningitis which affected 2,411 people in 2003, but also substantially raises public awareness of this potentially fatal disease.
S2M-1751 16th Spencer Dayman Meningitis UK Walk (lodged on 22 September 2004) Mr Brian Monteith*

S2M-1751 Mr David Davidson: 16th Spencer Dayman Meningitis UK Walk—That the Parliament congratulates the organisers of, and participants in, the 16th Spencer Dayman Meningitis UK walk which covers 770 miles from Peterhead to Lyme Regis in 36 days and notes that the charity has not only raised over £1 million to fund research into producing a vaccine to protect against all forms of bacterial meningitis which affected 2,411 people in 2003, but also substantially raises public awareness of this potentially fatal disease. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith
S2M-1751 16th Spencer Dayman Meningitis UK Walk (lodged on 22 September 2004) Ms Sandra White*, Tricia Marwick*
S2M-1751 16th Spencer Dayman Meningitis UK Walk (lodged on 22 September 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-1751 16th Spencer Dayman Meningitis UK Walk (lodged on 22 September 2004) Elaine Smith*
